#### Chapter 2

### 2.1

Suppose,

$X_1 = 1, X_2 = 3, X_3 = 0,$
$X_4 = -2, X_5 = 4, X_6 = -1,$
$X_7 = 5, X_8 = 2, X_9 = 10.$

```{r, echo = T}
x <- c(1, 3, 0, -2, 4, -1, 5, 2, 10)
```

Find:

a.) $\sum{X_i}$

```{r, echo = T}
sum(x)
```

b.) $\sum^5_{i=3}X_i$

```{r, echo = T}
sum( x[3:5] )
```

c.) $\sum^4_{i=1}X^3_i$

```{r, echo = T}
sum(x[1:4]^3)
```

d.) $(\sum{X_i})^2$

```{r, echo = T}
(sum(x))^2
```

e.) $\sum{3}$

```{r, echo = T}
3 * length(x)
```

f.) $\sum{(X_i - 7)}$

```{r, echo = T}
sum(x - 7)
```

g.) $3\sum^5_{i=1}X_i - \sum^9_{i=6}X_i$

```{r, echo = T}
3 * sum( x[1:5] ) - sum( x[6:9] )
```

h.) $\sum{10X}$

```{r, echo = T}
sum( 10 * x)
```

i.) $\sum^6_{i=2}iX_i$

```{r, echo = T}
i <- 2:6
sum( i * x[i]  )
```

j.) $\sum6$

```{r, echo = T}
6 * length(x)
```

### 2.2

Express the following in summation notation.

a.) $X_1 + \frac{X_2}{2} + \frac{X_3}{3} + \frac{X_4}{4}$

$\ldots = \frac{X_1}{1} + \frac{X_2}{2} + \frac{X_3}{3} + \frac{X_4}{4}$

$\ldots = \sum{^4}_{i=1}{\frac{X_i}{i}}$

b.) $U_1 + U^2_2 + U^3_3 + U^4_4$

$\ldots = U^1_1 + U^2_2 + U^3_3 + U^4_4$

$\ldots = \sum^4_{i=1}{U^i_i}$

c.) $(Y_1 + Y_2 + Y_3)^4$

$(\sum^3_{i=1}{Y_i})^4$
